comments_since_last_sample.body: I like everything about the game other than the combat. The writers definitely love the universe.

I was talking to my friend about it on Thursday so there was definitely 2 people talking about it on that day.....think that was it though nobody else talked about it that day to my knowledge

Don't know about Friday though.
People have been talking about it on this sub nonstop since it was released.

Assumed it would be a sad cash grab from the fans of the series and end up like Marvels Avengers so I have no interest in it. Even if it’s good. The long history of bad games that are ports from movie I just have no interest in playing this. Even if it is good I’ve been burnt so many times I wipe my hands if that stuff now.

Yeah the story and characters are great for the fans of the comics/movies

but gameplay is mediocre 

I wouldn't suggest this game to a non fan of the comics/movies
Have this game ready to go for Monday! Hearing a lot of great stuff, I’m definitely in the mood for a linear, story game right now!

I was excited to see this game,  until I saw that none of the characters look like I expected. I wanted to see the characters modeled after the movie characters, having them look.... different,  completely soured me on even wanting to try it.  Starlord looks wrong,  Drax looks wrong,  Gamora looks wrong,  Rocket looks more rat like than racoon,  hell even Groot just looks.... off. I guess it must be because I never did read the comics and have only known them through the movies. Oh well.
I genuinely didn't even know it was a thing until the day before it was released.
Got burned on my last two new releases. Hesitant with any right now.

It actually is.

The story is really good & the characters have great chemistry & are interesting, more especially Mantis. Why couldn’t we get this Mantis in the movies?
Yea it’s great and I love the chemistry with all of the characters.

i played the cloud demo on my switch. it was definitely interesting, didn’t run particularly well but that’s to be expected with a cloud stream. i’m sure i’ll have more to say when i play it on a stronger console.
